ProductsDetail.ProductName: Peace of Mined - OPI Infinite Shine Nail Polish
ProductsDetail.Description:
• This sunny long-lasting nail polish is an instant pick-me-up.

  • Let this rich yellow shade inspire and energize you.

  • OPI's Infinite Shine is a three-step long lasting nail polish line that provides gel-like high shine and 11 days of wear.

  • Use with Infinite Shine Primer and Infinite Shine Gloss for extended wear.

  • Made in the USA.
ProductsDetail.Field2:
1. Properly prep your natural nail for long lasting nail polish to ensure lacquer adhesion.

  2. Apply one coat of Infinite Shine Primer.

  3. Shake long lasting nail polish shade of choice before application to properly mix pigment (this will help avoid streakiness!).

  4. Apply two thin coats of Infinite Shine to each nail. Brush some polish at the nail's free edge to cap the nails and help prevent chipping.

  5. Lastly, apply one coat of Infinite Shine Gloss. Also cap the free edge with Infinite Shine Gloss.

attributeValues.childProductName: Medi-take It All In - OPI Nail Lacquer
attributeValues.childProductDescription:
• Take a moment for yourself with this radiant shade.

  • This purple nail polish will leave you feeling energized.

  • Nail Lacquer is OPI's original nail polish formula.

  • Use your nail polish shade with OPI Natural Nail Base Coat and OPI Top Coat for extended wear.

  • Made in the USA.
attributeValues.optionText: Medi-take It All In - OPI Nail Lacquer
attributeValues.childProductField2:
1. Properly prep your natural nail to ensure nail lacquer adhesion.

  2. Start by applying one coat of OPI Natural Nail Base Coat.

  3. Shake nail polish shade of choice before application to properly mix pigment (this will help avoid streakiness!).

  4. Apply two thin coats to each nail. Brush some nail polish at the nail's free edge to cap the nail and help prevent chipping.

  5. Lastly, apply OPI Top Coat. Also cap the free edge with Top Coat.

  6. For a manicure that's dry to the touch in minutes, apply 1 drop of DripDry Lacquer Drying Drops to each nail.

ProductsDetail.ProductName: It's a Boy! - OPI Infinite Shine Nail Polish
ProductsDetail.Description:
"

  • Pastel blue isn't just for baby boys.

  • This soft light blue nail polish shade is so pretty the stork delivered it himself.

  • OPI's Infinite Shine is a three-step long lasting nail polish line that provides gel-like high shine and 11 days of wear.

  • Use with Infinite Shine Primer and Infinite Shine Gloss for extended wear.

  • Made in the USA.

ProductsDetail.Field2:
1. Properly prep your natural nail for long lasting nail polish to ensure lacquer adhesion.

  2. Apply one coat of Infinite Shine Primer.

  3. Shake long lasting nail polish shade of choice before application to properly mix pigment (this will help avoid streakiness!).

  4. Apply two thin coats of Infinite Shine to each nail. Brush some polish at the nail's free edge to cap the nails and help prevent chipping.

  5. Lastly, apply one coat of Infinite Shine Gloss. Also cap the free edge with Infinite Shine Gloss.

ProductsDetail.ProductName: Tickle My France-y - OPI Infinite Shine Nail Polish
ProductsDetail.Description:
• This pink-based neutral is perfect for subtle, classic manicures.

  • Only the French can be so naughty yet so classy - embrace it with this nude nail polish.

  • OPI's Infinite Shine is a three-step long lasting nail polish line that provides gel-like high shine and 11 days of wear.

  • Use with Infinite Shine Primer and Infinite Shine Gloss for extended wear.

  • Made in the USA.
